explains: n. 葱（scallion 的复数）；青葱

sentences.en: It's made from milk, scallions and cheese.
sentences.cn: 它是用牛奶，青葱和奶酪一同混合而成的。

sentences.en: Season the chicken with salt, garlic and scallions.
sentences.cn: 用食盐、大蒜、葱给鸡块调味。

sentences.en: Garnish with the other half of your scallions and serve immediately.
sentences.cn: 在鱼身上撒上另一半葱段作为装饰，然后直接用它待客。
